channel.title: Public game results
channel.description:
We occasionally hear things from devs like "possessor's win rate is much lower than reaper", which are super interesting. I'd like to be able to dig through that data myself. Currently I have guesses based on personal experience, like "alchs tend to survive after the nk is dead" and "reapers tend to win more in games where unseen/cult did well". I'd like to replace those guesses with numbers.
Nothing too fancy would be necessary, I'm thinking of something along the lines of:
* csv or json data stuck on a web server somewhere * daily dump or similar is fine, no need to be real time * no names, no chat logs, no day-by-day of what happened, just: original and final classes, winners, when people died, and the game version
I could learn a lot just from that.

item.title: Public game results
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Would put you leagues ahead of your competitors too

Read full topic
